forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 5 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
The morning in Downtown San Francisco unfolds with a gentle embrace of sunshine, casting a delicate warmth as the day begins. As the sun rises higher, it nudges the anticipated high of around 67 degrees, though the afternoon will cool slightly to a comfortable 64. Winds from the west-southwest bring a playful breeze, with whispers of gusts that may occasionally flirt with your skin, reminding you of the ocean’s proximity. Despite the bright moments, the horizon hints at a gradual shift; clouds are weaving their way in, cloaking the evening in a softer, more introspective light.

With twilight approaching, the clouds will blanket the city, ushering in a comfortable low of about 57 degrees. The lingering influence of the marine layer might leave wispy traces where often the fog can nurture the coast, creating a serene backdrop for an evening stroll. For those contemplating attire, layers will serve well; a light jacket over a t-shirt enables you to adapt gracefully as the sun dips below the skyline, and the breeze carries a chilled kiss. 

In this tranquil yet lively atmosphere, consider a meandering walk along the waterfront or a visit to a cozy café to indulge in an afternoon read. As the city sheds its sunlight, the muted colors of twilight encourage you to embrace the ease of the evening, perhaps accompanied by a friend, sharing thoughts in the glow of San Francisco’s softening hues, making the most of this gentle transition from day to night.
